page.title: 10The Moat House International
page.content: Life Styles. The Moat House is situated between the Bridgeway and the River Avon.The Hotel has 249 bedrooms as well as a conference room and a ballroom.It employs 210 full-time and part-time staff.27 of these are chefs the rest are room-maids,receptionists, waiters,porters,accountants,laundry workers,engineers and management.Live entertainment is provided by a pianist in the restaurant,a guitarist in the entrance lobby,and a disco in the Actors'Bar.In 1984 89380 guests stayed at the Hotel.Most of these were American tourists staying for one night at the weekend.Conference members usually stay 3 or 4 nights. Famous actors and dancers also stay at the Hotel in suites.There are two Moat Houses in Stratford and this is the larger and busier.The Hotel was previously the Stratford Hilton.
